Room.Name: Hillcrest Drive
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Hillcrest Drive, south of the Allisk Manor.
Room.LongDescription: Natasha de Allisk is thought to be one of the last remaining vampires in Oceancrest, most of the others being vanquished some decades ago by some overly pompus paladins who didn't like the way the vampires were killing the children. Natasha escaped capture by putting a curse on her Mansion making it nearly impossible to reach her. She also built the Allisk Labyrinth to provide an accessible escape for her vampire brothers and sisters.
